meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Elisabeth Houlik Rich Hansen Fidelito Cortes Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6677.

td.p: Elisabeth Houlik, an accountant from Allentown, Pennsylvania
Rich Hansen, an attorney from Chicago, Illinois
Fidelito Cortes, a writer from Port Jefferson Station, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,000)

tr.td: SOME 4-LETTER WORDS
MAPPING THE NFL
ANDREW JACKSON
DAYS
OF SWINE
"ROSE"S

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The skirt worn by the sugar plum fairy')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The skirt worn by the sugar plum fairy

toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'the Seahawks & the Dolphins

Rich

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Fidelito
Rich
Elisabeth
2013 BOOKS
FORMER SOVIET REPUBLICS
CASTLING
ARIAS
NAME THE TV ROLE
GOLDEN WORDS
(Alex: Golden because each correct response will contain the letters "A-U", the symbol for gold.)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
